title: About Making the Low-Tier Tamer Profession Top-Tier Using My Previous Life’s Knowledge - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Aristocracy   Beast Companions   Death   Dense Protagonist   Dungeons   Guilds   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Male Protagonist   Monster Tamer   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Strong to Stronger
author: Yoshigae Tamaki   可換 環
description:
Due to an accident, the protagonist Varius died and was reincarnated. He was shocked to find in this new world, his former job as a Tamer in the previous world was acknowledged as a low class job in this new world.

Utilizing his knowledge from his previous life as a basis, he then applied unique buffs to his beasts, taking back the ultimate power that he once possessed.

With this power in his hands, he sought to start his life as an adventurer. However->
